sys_element_mapping.value:
Brooke,

A new project has been added to the SpaceShip. Please download the plans/specs from Trigger➛Project Record➛Original Plan Service, Project Number: Trigger➛Project Record➛Original Plan Service Project Number using Trigger➛Project Record➛Original Plan Service➛Login Name and Trigger➛Project Record➛Original Plan Service➛Password.

Thank you.

 

Trigger➛Project Record➛Project Manager
